response.overview: Faezeh Hahsemi daughter of the Iran's powerful president, Ayatollah Hashemi Rafsanjani. Faezeh Hahsemi is the most news making woman in the Islamic republic's history. She was at first, only, known as the courageous daughter of the Iran's powerful president, Ayatollah Hashemi Rafsanjani. But quickly she became an independent character and turned into one of the most influential individuals in the world of politics in Iran with her speeches about Baha'i in Iran and also with her protests against the election in Ahmadi Nejhad Time.
response.title: Like a Woman
